text: 10:4 Onger Akaba 78:15Egha me bar moghɨra dɨpar God me ganɨngiziba ame. God dagɨar me ko aruim gamizɨma, dɨpam an ikegha otivaghirima, me aneme. Ezɨ dagɨar kam, a Krais uabɨ.10:4 Akɨnafarir Mosesɨn ingangarimɨn gun mɨgeiba, da mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir pumuning iti, aning Israelia dɨpam dagɨamɨn a inizir arazim geghari. Mam, Ua Me Ini 17:1-7ɨn iti, ezɨ mam Dɨboboniba 21:1-13ɨn iti. Judabar marazi ghaze, mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kamning dagɨar vamɨram eghari. Dagɨar kam Israelian gɨn danganir me aruiba bar dagh arui.
